short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with people around the world about your favorite shows and movies through a float sidebar on the streaming page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interact with others on episodes of series or movies from streaming services like Netflix, Prime Video, and Crunchyroll by leaving a comment or replying to someone else's comment, or simply scrolling through the comments to learn what people are saying about that episode.

Streamings Supported:

• Crunchyroll
• Netflix
• Prime Video
• Disney+
• Max

New features coming soon...
